function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases in the workplace through shared office tools.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differing levels of hazard and exposure potential to covid-19 in various workplace environments , hospitals and airports .","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Application of failure mode and effects analysis fmea to different workplaces for risk assessment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of covid-19 preparedness and response plans","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to identify and isolate infected persons promptly","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate adherence to basic preventive measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of appropriate isolation and reporting of covid-19 cases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Restrictions on covid-19 testing by private sector","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of workplace flexibilities and protections","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor ventilation in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of administrative control measures in the workplace","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate biocontainment features in healthcare facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Surge in covid-19 patients requiring space, staff, supplies, and systems to manage capacity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate infection control measures during activities with suspected or confirmed cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher risk of covid-19 transmission in healthcare workplaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contact with health care workers caring for covid-19 patients","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contact with patients diagnosed positive for sars-cov-2 virus infection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of enhanced infection control measures in various activities with suspected or confirmed cases, samples, material, and waste","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of regular covid-19 infection risk assessment","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglect of green space quality","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Health risks originating from social and physical environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Little attention to the quality of green spaces may affect the benefits to people","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Degradation and fragmentation of natural habitats in urban areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to pollutants and parasites transmission in urban areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex health and ecological challenges may not be adequately addressed through holistic systems-thinking, leading to inefficient interventions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Laboratory experiments using visual stimuli and students as participants may not fully represent the reality of user experience in green spaces or the characteristics of the whole population.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of studies on urban green spaces in developing countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Transferability of empirical evidence from developed to developing countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Role of perceived safety in urban green spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to nature in urban areas leading to reduced restoration and well-being","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interactions with humans may be detrimental to animals, causing stress responses and changes in population size and distribution.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Indicators of green space quality are influenced by outcomes in bird assemblages, leading to potential bias in wildlife outcome assessments.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inclusion of measures that assess qualitative aspects of community composition is important to distinguish between urban exploiters, alien and invasive species, and native and sensitive species in green spaces.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of interdisciplinary work in addressing human, animal, and environmental factors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited studies comparing human use and biodiversity conservation in green spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Focus on the effect of biodiversity on human health rather than considering both dimensions simultaneously","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conflicts between human and wildlife dimensions in green spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unestablished aspects in the relationship between mental health, wildlife, and green spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conflicts related to the naturalness level of vegetation in green spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate evidence on the effect of green space qualities on mental health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential human health risks, such as zoonotic and vector-borne diseases, associated with enhancing biodiversity in urban areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglected intangible benefits of wildlife to humans","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited investigation of the challenge of meeting human use and biodiversity conservation in a limited space","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for multiple dimensions under a socioecological-systems perspective","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic impacting people’s lives and businesses","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Threats to the validity of energy social science research","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Researchers from multiple institutions and countries collaborating on principles","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Focus on social science research during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges to validity in research studies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited generalizability of findings in laboratory experiments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
